title: CMI Level 5 Award in Management and Leadership
description: Awarded CMI Level 5 Award in Management and Leadership (Qualification Code: 603/2390/5) on 01 September 2021.

title: Best Woman Researcher in Science and Technology
description: Awarded as Best Woman Researcher in Science and Technology for impactful and sustained research contributions.

title: Outstanding Woman in Engineering (VIWA)
description: Awarded as Outstanding Woman in Engineering (VIWA-2017) for exceptional contributions to engineering and academia.

title: CMI Certificate – Managing Change
description: CMI certificate issued for attainment of unit “Managing Change” (Unit Code: K/606/3223) on 01 September 2021.

title: Lifetime Achievement Award for Academic Leadership
description: Lifetime Achievement Award for Academic Leadership (CSCI/2425-TDA-00159) awarded on 05 September 2024.
